languages.text: "Слава Императору нет. Но однажды мне довелось конвоировать в столицу сектора Каликсис некую персону особой важности. Сам губернатор ожидал его. Я провел восемь терранских месяцев в запечатанных покоях наедине с ним, пока корабль шел к Сцинтилле. Не знаю, кем он был, и какая важность вознесла его в ранг опекаемых Адептус Арбитис субъектов. Знаю лишь, что он очень любил играть на органе эту мелодию. Я запомнил ее".

traits.locale_text: я не умею. Точнее, умею, но только эту мелодию.

languages.text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I was once assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."

languages.text: 「いいえ、神帝陛下のおかげです。かつて私は、キャリクシス星域の首都惑星へ、とある特別な重要人物を護衛する任務を与えられたことがありました。その人物は、総督自らが出迎えることになっていました。船でスキンティッラへ向かう間、私は密閉区画で彼と二人きりで、地球時間で8か月を過ごしました。彼が何者なのか、また、どうして高等裁定局の保護を受けるほどの地位を持っていたのかはわかりません。ただ、彼がオルガンでこの曲を弾くのをとても好んでいたことだけは覚えています。私はこの曲を自然に覚えてしまったんです」
languages.original_text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I was once assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、神帝陛下のおかげです。かつて私は、キャリクシス星域の首都惑星へ、とある特別な重要人物を護衛する任務を与えられたことがありました。その人物は、総督自らが出迎えることになっていました。船でスキンティッラへ向かう間、私は密閉区画で彼と二人きりで、地球時間で8か月を過ごしました。彼が何者なのか、また、どうして高等裁定局の保護を受けるほどの地位を持っていたのかはわかりません。ただ、彼がオルガンでこの曲を弾くのをとても好んでいたことだけは覚えています。私はこの曲を自然に覚えてしまったんです」

languages.text: "Nein, dem Gottimperator sei Dank. Aber ich sollte einst eine bestimmte Person von höchster Wichtigkeit zur Hauptwelt des Calixis-Sektors eskortieren. Er sollte von niemand Geringerem als dem Gouverneur selbst empfangen werden. Ich habe acht Terra-Monate alleine mit ihm in abgeriegeltem Quartier verbracht, während das Schiff nach Scintilla flog. Ich weiß nicht, wer er war oder welcher Sonderstatus ihm den Schutz des Adeptus Arbites eingebracht hatte. Ich weiß nur, dass er sehr gerne dieses Stück auf der Orgel spielte. Ich habe es auswendig gelernt."
languages.original_text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I was once assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, dem Gottimperator sei Dank. Aber ich sollte einst eine bestimmte Person von höchster Wichtigkeit zur Hauptwelt des Calixis-Sektors eskortieren. Er sollte von niemand Geringerem als dem Gouverneur selbst empfangen werden. Ich habe acht Terra-Monate alleine mit ihm in abgeriegeltem Quartier verbracht, während das Schiff nach Scintilla flog. Ich weiß nicht, wer er war oder welcher Sonderstatus ihm den Schutz des Adeptus Arbites eingebracht hatte. Ich weiß nur, dass er sehr gerne dieses Stück auf der Orgel spielte. Ich habe es auswendig gelernt."

languages.text: « Non, et j'en rends grâce à l'Empereur-Dieu. Mais fut un temps où on m'avait chargé d'escorter une personnalité de premier plan jusqu'au monde-capitale du secteur Calixis. Il devait être reçu par le gouverneur en personne, rien que ça. Nous avons passé huit mois en tête-à-tête dans les quartiers qui lui étaient réservés à bord du vaisseau à destination de Scintilla. J'ignore qui il était et quel statut particulier lui avait valu la protection de l'Adeptus Arbites. Tout ce que je sais, c'est qu'il adorait jouer ce morceau à l'orgue. À la longue, je l'ai appris par cœur. »
languages.original_text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I was once assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."

traits.locale_text: « Non, et j'en rends grâce à l'Empereur-Dieu. Mais fut un temps où on m'avait chargé d'escorter une personnalité de premier plan jusqu'au monde-capitale du secteur Calixis. Il devait être reçu par le gouverneur en personne, rien que ça. Nous avons passé huit mois en tête-à-tête dans les quartiers qui lui étaient réservés à bord du vaisseau à destination de Scintilla. J'ignore qui il était et quel statut particulier lui avait valu la protection de l'Adeptus Arbites. Tout ce que je sais, c'est qu'il adorait jouer ce morceau à l'orgue. À la longue, je l'ai appris par cœur. »

languages.text: «No, gracias al Dios Emperador. Pero en una ocasión me encomendaron escoltar a cierta persona de particular relevancia hasta el mundo capital del sector Calixis. Debía reunirse con el mismísimo gobernador, nada menos. Pasé ocho meses terranos a solas con él en un espacio confinado mientras la nave viajaba rumbo a Escintila. Ignoro quién era o qué tipo de privilegio le hacía merecedor de la protección del Adeptus Arbites. Lo único que sé es que le encantaba interpretar esta melodía al órgano. Me la sé de memoria».
languages.original_text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I was once assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."

traits.locale_text: «No, gracias al Dios Emperador. Pero en una ocasión me encomendaron escoltar a cierta persona de particular relevancia hasta el mundo capital del sector Calixis. Debía reunirse con el mismísimo gobernador, nada menos. Pasé ocho meses terranos a solas con él en un espacio confinado mientras la nave viajaba rumbo a Escintila. Ignoro quién era o qué tipo de privilegio le hacía merecedor de la protección del Adeptus Arbites. Lo único que sé es que le encantaba interpretar esta melodía al órgano. Me la sé de memoria».

languages.text: “感谢神皇，并不是。不过，我之前负责护送某位特别重要的成员，前往卡利西斯星区的首都世界，他得到了总督的亲自接待。飞船驶往辛蒂拉这段期间，我和他在封闭的船舱里整整度过了八个泰拉月。我不知道他是谁，也不知道他拥有什么特殊身份，竟然需要法务部亲自派人保护。我只知道，他很喜欢用管风琴演奏这首曲子，于是我暗自记住了这首曲子。”
languages.original_text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I was once assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."

traits.locale_text: “感谢神皇，并不是。不过，我之前负责护送某位特别重要的成员，前往卡利西斯星区的首都世界，他得到了总督的亲自接待。飞船驶往辛蒂拉这段期间，我和他在封闭的船舱里整整度过了八个泰拉月。我不知道他是谁，也不知道他拥有什么特殊身份，竟然需要法务部亲自派人保护。我只知道，他很喜欢用管风琴演奏这首曲子，于是我暗自记住了这首曲子。”

languages.text: "Hayır, Tanrı İmparator'a şükür ki yok. Fakat vaktiyle Calixis Sektörü'nün başkentine kadar pek mühim bir şahsa refakat etmekle görevlendirilmiştim. Vali ile buluşturmam, önemli bir meseleydi. Scintilla'ya seyrederken sekiz Terra ayı boyunca bir geminin kapalı bölümünde yalnızdık. Kim olduğunu bilmem, Adeptus Arbites korumasını nasıl elde etmiş hiç bilmem. Tek bildiğim, bu parçayı orgda çalmaya pek düşkündü. Ben de ezberledim."
languages.original_text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I was once assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, Tanrı İmparator'a şükür ki yok. Fakat vaktiyle pek mühim bir şahsı Calixis Sektörü'nün başkentine refakat etmekle görevlendirilmiştim. Vali ile buluşturmam elzem bir meseleydi. Scintilla'ya seyrederken sekiz Terra ayı boyunca bir geminin kapalı bölümünde yalnızdık. Kim olduğunu bilmem, Adeptus Arbites korumasını nasıl elde etmiş hiç bilmem. Tek bildiğim, bu parçayı orgda çalmaya pek düşkün idi, ben de ezberledim."

languages.original_text: "No, thank the God-Emperor. But I once was assigned to escort a certain person of particular importance to the capital world of the Calixis Sector. He was to be received by no less than the governor himself. I spent eight Terran months alone with him in sealed quarters while the ship made the voyage to Scintilla. I don't know who he was or what special status earned him the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. I only know that he was very fond of playing this tune on the organ. I learned it by heart."
